articles.title: Google expands eSIM support on the Pixel 3 to Sprint and other carriers - The Verge
articles.description: Google became the first smartphone company to support built-in eSIMs with its Project Fi (now Google Fi) network last year. Now, it's expanding that even further with the announcement of several new carriers around the world that will support the feature, as …
articles.content: Google became the first smartphone company to support built-in eSIMs with its Project Fi ( now Google Fi ) network last year. Now, its expanding that even further with the announcement of several new carriers around the world that will support the feature. In… [+566 chars]
